attributes.action: Allow us to take the law into our own hands, when the police fail to act
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the police seem to have there hands tied with red tape and paperwork and when they do manage to get a result the courts hand out soft sentences or an ASBO which is pretty much accepted by the youth of today as a fashion accessory. If we was allowed to act ourselves and take the trouble makers out of the sight and give them a punishment which we feel they deserve without the risk of us being punished (to a more severe manner than the trouble makers in the first place) then I’m sure it wouldn’t be to long before the fear factor took over and the youth of today became to scared to cause problems and trouble they do.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
